graph_title: Number of victims of homicide (by sex and age)
indicator_name: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex and age
target_name: Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
data_name: Number of victims of homicide (by sex and age)
indicator_definition: The number of victims in cases counted as homicides depending on the characteristics of victims
computation_calculations: Complied from data entered by police departments based on the Korean Crime Statistics System entries
global_indicator_name: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex and age
source_organisation_1: Investigation Management and Support Division, Korean National Policy Agency
title: Untitled
